ACRX Ive been a champion of Vince But its time to admit that his missteps are going to ruin this stock 1 He raised too soon after the approval 2 He deprioritized Zal 3 He failed to get EU partnership 4 He kept his Q updates to minimum 5 He assumed too much risk in this antiopioid era by not considering bo or some other transaction in the US 6 He underestimated the capital and time needed to sell a pain drug to the hospitals 7 In spite of being a DoD sales rep in the past he failed go secure early wins with large federal customers like DoD and VA Also he gets paid too much
